roleset.name: increase in methyl group to cytosine or adenosine residues in DNA

role.descr: result of epigenetic modification; DNA/protein underexpressed

roleset.note: Based on Thyme data. No Comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie.

example.name: arg 1
example.text: Inactivation of HOXA genes by hypermethylation in the myeloid and lymphoid malignancys

example.name: arg 2 will be more common than arg 0
